favourite.article: Is this written by a Filipino? Good song, let our consecration be thorough so we that we don't limit the Lord.
Oh how I love You my Lord Jesus. I consecrate myself to You.
Lord, we follow Your footsteps because we love You. Lord everyday we submit everything to You. Your ruling and Your reigning brings a sweet supply. Oh what a rich blessing to us.

We praise You for being so Sovereign! Hidden behind every scene, Lovingly, sweetly operating, One who is sovereign and wise, Patiently guides even our eyes. Oh, what a rich blessing! We’re in the hand of our King.

Lord, we see You! Lord, we love You! Lord, we submit everything to You. Each day, Your ruling and Your reigning Brings a sweet supply. Oh, what a rich blessing! We’re in the hand of our King. Everything You hope to accomplish, do in me.
Amen, Lord. We could not say anything but this word, Amen.
